name: google-drive-transfer
description: A Node.js application for transferring ownership of Google Drive files between accounts

scripts.test:auth: node -e "const GoogleAuth = require('./src/auth/auth'); const auth = new GoogleAuth(); console.log('Auth module loaded successfully');"
scripts.test:config: node -e "const config = require('./config/config'); console.log('Configuration:', JSON.stringify(config, null, 2));"
scripts.setup: npm install && node -e "console.log('âœ… Setup complete! Please configure your .env file.');"
